mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery (gtitle, gcontent, gfile, mno) VALUES (#{gtitle}, #{gcontent}, #{gfile}, (SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid=#{mid}))
mapper.select: SELECT gno, gtitle, gfile, if(date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(gdate, '%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(gdate, '%h:%i'), date_format(gdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS gdate, glike FROM gallery WHERE gdel='1' ORDER BY gno DESC

SELECT g.gno, g.gtitle, g.gfile, g.gcontent, date_format(g.gdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %h시 %i분 %s초') AS gdate, g.glike, m.mname, m.mid, m.mpfpic FROM gallery g JOIN member m ON g.mno=m.mno WHERE gdel='1' AND gno=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE gallery SET gdel='0' WHERE gno=#{gno} AND mno=(SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid=#{mid})
